content:
User: No items match search

Gemini: In your command prompt, please type these commands and tell me the output of each:

where python
(and press Enter)

where pip
(and press Enter)

Tell me the output of both where python and where pip.

If where python shows a path that is different from the Google Cloud SDK path (i.e., not under C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Cloud SDK\...), it might indicate you have another Python installation.
If where pip finds a pip.exe anywhere on your system, even if pip --version didn't work before, it might give us a clue about where pip is actually located.
Let's see if these commands give us any more information before we move to installing a separate Python.
